text: Pas pojdorī kun, hamcunon ki pajomʙaroni ululazm (ʙoazm) pojdorī karda ʙudand, Va dar uquʙataşon şitoʙ makun. On rūz, ki on va'daero, ki ʙa onho doda şuda, ʙingarand, pindorand, ki çuz ʙa qadri so'ate az rūz dar gūr namonda ʙudand. In rasonidani pajƣom ast. Ojo çuz nofarmonon ʙa halokat merasand
